Text:
Thanks! 

GOing to try to use this as an alternative to Cyberlink's PowerDVD. It has become too bloated and does too much to my computer. All I want is solid DVD playback and nice features like bookmarks and resume from where I left off.

Thanks for the u/l Murlok. This looks like what I need...I hope. ;) 

Yup, I see the pink skull. :D
